scripts.test: npm run test-webserver && sleep 10 && npm run test-firefox && sleep 3 && kill `cat test-webserver.py.pid`
scripts.test-firefox: export PROFILEDIR=`mktemp -p /tmp -d tmp-fx-profile.XXXXXX.d` && firefox -profile $PROFILEDIR -no-remote -new-instance http://127.0.0.1:8000 && rm -rf $PROFILEDIR
